subject: Re: [junit] Generating Reports
msgSnippet: Prasad: You can find more about this ant task and how to use it in the junit faqs itself. Section 6. Running tests Q: How do I use Ant to create HTML test
messageBody:
Prasad: You can find more about this ant task and how to use it in the junit faqs itself.

Section 6. Running tests
Q: How do I use Ant to create HTML test reports?


Thanks,
Anuj

Stephen Smith <steve@...> wrote:
If you use Ant to run your JUnit tests, you can use the <junitreport>
task after establishing a set of text-based or XML-based results.

--
Stephen Smith, MEng (Wales).
http://www.stephen-smith.co.uk/

Prasad wrote:
> Hi Everybody,
>
> Can we generate test result reports(text or html) using junit ?
>
> With regards
> Vara Prasad
